<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This product is based on daily soil moisture estimates, developed in the context of the Climate Change Initiative (CCI). We derived  monthly averages weighted weighted by per-pixel uncertainties and used them to derive annual climatologies.
</p>
